creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of a bedroom with baby and child sleeping on a bed with a floral bedspread; picture of a landscape with tree on wall above bed; small TV at right on chest of drawers
portfolio: From Human Arts and Technology series
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard
title: Daytime TV and Babies Sleeping, Bedroom, Berkeley, CA
